author: Staff Reporter
text:
She will take part in a literary discussion today

Writer-philosopher Hélène Cixous will participate in a literary discussion hosted by the Alliance Francaise on Friday, where she will discuss her collaboration with French theatre artiste Ariane Mnouchkine and her theatre group Théâtre du Soleil, among other things. The event is part of a line-up of programmes celebrating Ms. Mnouchkine and the Soleil’s stay in Puducherry. The discussion, which is reserved for members of the Alliance Francaise, will be held at the Maison Colombani from 6 p.m.

The pair have worked together on l'Histoire terrible mais inachevée de Norodom Sihanouk, roi du Cambodge (The Terrible but Unfinished Story of Norodom Sihanouk, King of Cambodia), l'Indiade , La Ville parjure ou le réveil des Erinyes (The Treacherous City or the Awakening of the Furies), Et soudain, des nuits d’éveil (Sudden Sleepless Nights) and Tambours sur la Digue (The Flood Drummers) among others, and most recently on Les Naufragés du Fol Espoir . In fact, Les Naufragés du Fol Espoir will be presented by actors from the Soleil, Vincent Mangado and Dominique Jambert and screened at the Alliance Francaise for its members on Saturday.

Ms. Cixous will be joined in the discussion by Puducherry-based author Nicolas Deleau and Olivier Litvine, Director of Alliance Francaise Puducherry.
title: An evening with Hélène Cixous
